participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Active and adventurous, Emily enjoys exploring new cuisines and staying fit. She has a positive outlook on life and loves to try new things.
participant_1.background: I like to eat sushi when I'm not at the archery center. I have a bicycle. I enjoy the food network and HGTV while I'm on my diet. I have been exposed to a variety of cultures and lifestyles due to my upbringing. I live in the US and work out in my home gym every day to stay fit.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Creative and humorous, Jake has a quirky sense of humor and enjoys the outdoors. He loves to meet new people and has a knack for storytelling.
participant_2.background: I once told a cop that my car was sentient and it was driving itself. I've never been arrested, but I did meet one of my favorite celebrities and get his autograph when I was growing up in New Hampshire. I live in the countryside, where there's plenty of space for my black lab to run around. Winters my favorite time of the year. I love to go shopping and inspire myself in stylish stores.

content.text: Hi, I'm from the US and I like to eat sushi.  What's your favorite food?
I like to eat a lot of different foods.  I love sushi, but my favorite food is lobster.
Lobster is delicious!  I've only had it a few times, but I love it.
It's so good!  I'm lucky to live in New Hampshire, where there are a lot of great seafood restaurants.
I've been to New Hampshire once.  I went skiing in the White Mountains.
The White Mountains are beautiful!  I love to go hiking and camping there.
I'd love to go back sometime.  Maybe I'll bring my bicycle and go for a ride.
That would be fun!  I'd love to go on a bike ride with you.
Great!  We should plan a trip sometime.
